project_descr: Support to Emergency Mine Action Coordination at Provincial Level

outputs.output_descr: the aim of this 12-month project is to support and complement the role of the National Coordinating Authority, the Inter-Sectoral Commission on De-Mining and Humanitarian Assistance (Comissão Nacional Intersectorial de Desminagem e Assistência Humanitária, CNIDAH) in: 1) integrating mine action priorities into emergency assistance, resettlement, return and socio-economic recovery activities at regional/provincial level, 2) ensuring the integration of such regional/provincial priorities and activities into national strategies and at the national level; and 3) mobilizing urgent resources necessa

project_title: mine action coord. at provincial level
